definition: 3,4-Dihydroxybenzoate + NADPH + Bromide + Oxygen + 2 H+ <=> 3-Bromo-4,5-dihydroxybenzoate + NADP+ + 2 H2O
comment: the first step of two-step reaction (see R12018, R12019+R12020)
